GAMLj3 3.1.1
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Examples of gamlj_lm()
    • Examples of GAMLj Methods
    • Plots in GAMLj

    GAMLj plot

    plot.Rd

    This function re-estimates a GAMLj model adding a new plot. If no option is passed, extracts the plots present in the `gamlj*Results` object. If one plot is present, it is returned as a ggplot2 object, if more than one is present, a list of plots is returned. FALSE is returned if no plot is present or defined.

    # S3 method for gamlj
plot(x, formula = NULL, ...)

    Arguments

    x

    a gamlj results object of the class `gamlj`

    formula

    a right hand side formula specifying the effect to plot, of the form `~x`, `~x*z` or `~x*z*w`. It has prevalence on other options defining a plot.

    ...

    all options accepted by a gamlj model function. Relevant for new plots are plot_x, plot_z and plot_by

    Value

    an object of class ggplot or a list of ggplot objects

    Author

    Marcello Gallucci

    Examples

    data(qsport)
gmod<-GAMLj3::gamlj_lm(
  formula = performance ~ hours,
  data = qsport)
#> 
#> MODULE: lm   #### phase init  ####
#> 
#> INIT TIME: 0.075732946395874  secs
#> 
#> MODULE:  #### phase run ####
#> 
#> MODULE: Estimating the model: checking
#> 
#> MODULE: Estimating the model: making options
#> 
#> MODULE: Estimating the model: running
#> 
#> RUNNER: initial estimation done,  0.00188207626342773  secs
#> 
#> GPARAMETERS: default .parameters for class lm
#> 
#> MODULE:  #### phase end ####
#> 
#> RUN TIME: 0.166595458984375  secs
#> 
#> TIME: 0.245238065719604  secs

plot(gmod,plot_x = 'hours')
#> 
#> MODULE: lm   #### phase init  ####
#> 
#> PLOTTER: init main plot
#> 
#> INIT TIME: 0.0744504928588867  secs
#> 
#> MODULE:  #### phase run ####
#> 
#> MODULE: Estimating the model: checking
#> 
#> MODULE: Estimating the model: making options
#> 
#> MODULE: Estimating the model: running
#> 
#> RUNNER: initial estimation done,  0.00194406509399414  secs
#> 
#> GPARAMETERS: default .parameters for class lm
#> 
#> PLOTTER: prepare main plot
#> 
#> MODULE:  #### phase end ####
#> 
#> RUN TIME: 0.201501369476318  secs
#> 
#> TIME: 0.278612613677979  secs
#> Error: 'descPlots' does not exist in this results element
plot(gmod,formula=~hours)
